attributes.review: This is the worst app in the app store i almost feel bad for anyone that downloaded this unironically, i think it’s time for it to go😔💔good riddance.

this app ruined my life. it stole all my money and created a false rumor that got me fired from my job and expelled from college. the app told me i will never amount to anything and destroyed my hopes and dreams.  it called my grandma fat,  killed my uncle, and framed me for the murder. this app is the reason im serving 10 years in prison. 10/10 would not recommend downloading 💔
